prompts: Create a Pokemon with antlers that blends into forest environments.
Imagine a majestic creature that roams grassy plains with a gentle demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the wild with brown fur and elegant features.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that showcases a unique blend of reindeer and deer characteristics.
Generate a creature with large antlers and a calm personality, perfect for soothing forest spirits.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a soft, friendly appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that represents natural beauty with a mix of brown and white colors.
